mapper.select: select pk_mail_num, fk_senduser_num, empname, subject , to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_date from tbl_mail order by pk_mail_num desc

select count(*) from tbl_mail
where lower(${searchType}) like '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_mail(pk_mail_num, fk_senduser_num, fk_receiveuser_num, empname, email, subject, content, reg_date , importance, reservation_status, read_status) values(SEQ_MAIL.nextval, #{fk_senduser_num}, #{fk_receiveuser_num}, #{empname}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, default , default, default, default)
